DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date of PK sample collection or the start date of PK sample collection over a period of time (protocol-defined time-point range) represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to pharmacokinetic concentration._The date on which the sample or data was collected.

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the date of the PK s
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date of the PK sample collection?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the date when PK sample collection occurred using this format (DD-MON-YYYY). If left blank, "PCDATFL" for this specimen must be populated (or "PCPERF" must be flagged to indicate this sample was not collected).

ReferenceDocuments.name: PCDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable PCDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: A complete date is expected. The date of collection may be determined from the date of visit (VISDAT) and if so, a separate assessment date field is not required. The SDTMIG PCDTC variable contains either a date/time when a specimen is collected at a point in time or the start date/time, when a specimen is collected over time.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Date of Collection of Sample for Analysis
